ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Complete heal (was Numbers on Bards)
ygData.msgSnippet: That s not my experience in Sebelis.  I have several Minos in the bank (from my Lguk days) and have 126 Cha Unbuffed.  I get resists to Pixie a good 50 percent
ygData.messageBody:
That's not my experience in Sebelis. I have several Minos in the bank (from
my Lguk days) and have 126 Cha Unbuffed. I get resists to Pixie a good 50
percent of the time on High Blue Yellows in Sebelis

Slyde
52 Bard
-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Monday, January 22, 2001 12:19 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] OT Complete heal (was Numbers on Bards)

I have very little trouble keeping 2 mobs mezzed with pixie strike. Using a
mino horn (Save up for one of these babies!!!!) and with 135 unbuffed cha
(nothing special) I was keeping 2 mobs mezzed in chardok (where the mobs are
high blue/yellow to me, if a mob was red to me, we were probably killing it
first).

So Pixie is reliable enough to keep 2 mobs mezzed.


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
